welcome_message_body: Welcome to the charming city of Embu-Guacu! Known for its vibrant arts and crafts scene, lush greenery, and warm hospitality, we invite you to explore and immerse yourself in the beauty of our city. Enjoy your stay!

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
